What are the treatments for MECP2 duplication syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of MECP2 duplication syndrome:  - Cincinnati Children's Hospital: MECP2-Related Disorders  - Cleveland Clinic: Spasticity  - Gene Review: Gene Review: MECP2 Duplicatio
